misuses.description: The cipher algorithm used in this code is broken and should not be used for security purposes. The algorithm used is RC2, which has been shown to be vulnerable to attacks.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure and up-to-date encryption algorithm, such as AES or ChaCha20, instead of RC2. Additionally, use a secure key generation method, such as SecureRandom, to generate the encryption key.
